title: President grieved over life loss in Kacchi traffic accident
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 1 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Friday expressed grief over the loss of lives in a traffic accident in Kacchi, Balochistan.
The president prayed for the departed soul to rest in peace and extended condolences to the bereaved families.
He also prayed for the early recovery of the injured persons.
